reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 450/95: ZONING AREAS - TERRITOR1AL DISTRICT OF KENORA, UNORGANIZED TERRITORIES OF LAKE OF THE WOODS
reg_info.reg_name_text: ZONING AREAS — TERRiTORIaL DISTRICT OF KENORA, UNORGANIZED TERRITORIES OF LAKE OF THE WOODS
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 450/95: ZONING AREAS - TERRITOR1AL DISTRICT OF KENORA, UNORGANIZED TERRITORIES OF LAKE OF THE WOODS
reg_info.act_under: Planning Act   Loi sur l’aménagement du territoire

content.content: 1. In this Order,  “accessory”, when used to describe a use, building or structure, means a use, building or structure that is normally incidental or subordinate to the principal use, building or structure on the same lot; “dwelling unit” means one or more habitable rooms occupied or capable of being occupied as an independent and separate housekeeping establishment in which separate kitchen and sanitary facilities are provided for the exclusive use of the occupants; “lot” means a parcel of land shown as a lot on a registered plan of subdivision; “seasonal dwelling” means a building containing only one dwelling unit used for recreation and not occupied as a permanent residence. O. Reg. 450/95, s. 1. Application
content.raw_html:
1. In this Order,

“accessory”, when used to describe a use, building or structure, means a use, building or structure that is normally incidental or subordinate to the principal use, building or structure on the same lot;

“dwelling unit” means one or more habitable rooms occupied or capable of being occupied as an independent and separate housekeeping establishment in which separate kitchen and sanitary facilities are provided for the exclusive use of the occupants;

“lot” means a parcel of land shown as a lot on a registered plan of subdivision;

“seasonal dwelling” means a building containing only one dwelling unit used for recreation and not occupied as a permanent residence. O. Reg. 450/95, s. 1.

Application

content.content: 2. This Order applies to land on Rat Portage Bay, Lake of the Woods in the Territorial District of Kenora being, (a) that parcel of land being composed of Lots 1 to 17, inclusive, on Plan 23M-905 D.K.F. registered in die Land Registry Office for the Land Titles Division of Kenora (No. 23); (b) blocks 18, 19 and 20 on Plan 23M-905 D.K.F. registered in the Land Registry Office for the Land Titles Division of Kenora (No. 23); and (c) that parcel of land being Parcel 39391 D.K.F. O. Reg. 450/95, s. 2; O Reg. 188/97, s. 1. Seasonal Residential
content.raw_html:
2. This Order applies to land on Rat Portage Bay, Lake of the Woods in the Territorial District of Kenora being,

(a) that parcel of land being composed of Lots 1 to 17, inclusive, on Plan 23M-905 D.K.F. registered in die Land Registry Office for the Land Titles Division of Kenora (No. 23);

(b) blocks 18, 19 and 20 on Plan 23M-905 D.K.F. registered in the Land Registry Office for the Land Titles Division of Kenora (No. 23); and

(c) that parcel of land being Parcel 39391 D.K.F. O. Reg. 450/95, s. 2; O Reg. 188/97, s. 1.

Seasonal Residential

content.content: 3. Every use of land and every erection, location or use of buildings or structures is prohibited on the land described in clause (a) of section 2 except,  (a) one seasonal dwelling for each lot; and (b) uses, buildings and structures accessory to a seasonal dwelling. O. Reg. 450/95, s. 3.
content.raw_html:
3. Every use of land and every erection, location or use of buildings or structures is prohibited on the land described in clause (a) of section 2 except,

(a) one seasonal dwelling for each lot; and

(b) uses, buildings and structures accessory to a seasonal dwelling. O. Reg. 450/95, s. 3.

content.content: 4. No buildings or structures are to be located within 20 metres of the shoreline excluding docks, saunas and boathouses. O. Reg. 450/95, s. 4. Open Space
content.raw_html:
4. No buildings or structures are to be located within 20 metres of the shoreline excluding docks, saunas and boathouses. O. Reg. 450/95, s. 4.

Open Space

content.content: 5. Every use of land and every erection, location or use of buildings or structures is prohibited on the land described in clauses (b) and (c) of section 2 except conservation and open space uses. O. Reg. 450/95, s. 5. General
content.raw_html:
5. Every use of land and every erection, location or use of buildings or structures is prohibited on the land described in clauses (b) and (c) of section 2 except conservation and open space uses. O. Reg. 450/95, s. 5.

General

content.content: 6. (1) Nothing in this Order prevents the reconstruction of any building or structure that is damaged or destroyed by causes beyond the control of the owner if the dimensions of the original building or structure are not increased or its original use altered. O. Reg. 450/95, s. 6 (1). (2) Nothing in this Order prevents the strengthening or restoration to a safe condition of all or part of any building or structure. O. Reg. 450/95, s. 6 (2).
content.raw_html:
6. (1) Nothing in this Order prevents the reconstruction of any building or structure that is damaged or destroyed by causes beyond the control of the owner if the dimensions of the original building or structure are not increased or its original use altered. O. Reg. 450/95, s. 6 (1).

(2) Nothing in this Order prevents the strengthening or restoration to a safe condition of all or part of any building or structure. O. Reg. 450/95, s. 6 (2).

content.content: 7. (1) Despite section 4of the Order, no building or structure shall be located within 10 metres of the shoreline, excluding docks, saunas and boathouses, on lands described in subsection (2). O. Reg. 389/99, s. 1. (2) Subsection (1) applies to those lands on Rat Portage Bay, Lake of the Woods in the Territorial District of Kenora, being Lot 15 on Plan 23M-905 D.K.F. registered in the Land Registry Office for the Land Titles Division of Kenora (No. 23). O. Reg. 389/99, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
7. (1) Despite section 4of the Order, no building or structure shall be located within 10 metres of the shoreline, excluding docks, saunas and boathouses, on lands described in subsection (2). O. Reg. 389/99, s. 1.

(2) Subsection (1) applies to those lands on Rat Portage Bay, Lake of the Woods in the Territorial District of Kenora, being Lot 15 on Plan 23M-905 D.K.F. registered in the Land Registry Office for the Land Titles Division of Kenora (No. 23). O. Reg. 389/99, s. 1.
